content: this pattern was updated on december 10th 2009 warm funny and cute i fell in love with the monster-butted longies when i first saw a pair ages ago when i finally had the skills to make my own these were born i ve had so many requests for this pattern so now i m publishing it as promised a pdf version is available here https //drive google com/file/d/0bwjvacoahj9qmmvly2rizmitmwy2yy00yjq2ltkzmwytytkxngy3otuwnzm3/view usp=sharing&resourcekey=0-kycxuz8ednsso3nsha159w a french version is here https //docs google com/fileview id=0bwjvacoahj9qzgfkmde1ndctogyyzc00mdrmltkynzatzjiwyji5zdnkzwq0&hl=en and an icelandic version here http //docs google com/doc docid=0aqjvacoahj9qzgz0oddinjvfmtvnenfxnzhjbg&hl=en
